opis: ZADAR - BELAFUŽA / VIDIKOVAC - KUĆA S 4 APARTMANA Na prodaju je kuća u Zadru, bruto površine 291m2 izgrađena na zemljištu površine 397m2. Sastoji se od dvije etaže, prizemlja i kata te podruma. U prizemlju se nalaze dva apartmana, od kojih svaki ima jednu spavaću sobu, kupaonu, kuhinju, dnevni boravak i blagavaonu. Na katu se nalaze dva stambena prostora koji trenutno služe kao jedan te je moguće kat prenamjeniti u dva stambena prostora na način da se s vanjske strane izgrade stepenice. Trenutni raspored prostorija na katu se sastoji od dvije kuhinje, dva dnevna boravka s blagavaonama, tri spavaće sobe, dvije kupaone i hodnik. Iz dnevnog boravka sjevernog krila kata izlazi se na prostranu i odlično uređenu tereasu s roštiljem. Okućnica se proteže južnim i sjevernim djelom u sklopu kojeg se smijestila i garaža. S obzirom na površinu okućnice, moguća je gradnja bazena. U kući su ugrađena i 4 klima uređaja dok se u prizemlju nalazi kaljeva peć a na katu peć na drva. Izolacija kuće odrađena je u kamenoj vuni. U vidu investicije kuća pruža odličan potencijal zbog činjenice da se u prizemlju nalaze dva apartmana koja su već u turističkom najmu dok kat kuće svojom površinom pruža mogućnost ugodonog boravka za buduće vlasnike. Lokacija je izuzetno mirna te se s kata kuće pruža pogled na more. Više informacija i razgledavanje: Telefon: +385 99 701 6618 Email: marin.roncevic@c21.hr ----------------------------------------- ENGLISH: ZADAR - BELAFUŽA / VIDIKOVAC - HOUSE WITH 4 APARTMENTS For sale is a house in Zadar, with a gross floor area of 291m2, built on a land plot of 397m2. It consists of two floors, ground floor and first floor, as well as a basement. The ground floor includes two apartments, each with one bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, living room, and dining area. The first floor has two residential units that currently function as one, but it is possible to convert the floor into two separate residential units by constructing external stairs. The current layout of the first floor consists of two kitchens, two living rooms with dining areas, three bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a hallway. From the living room in the northern wing of the floor, there is access to a spacious and well-maintained terrace with a barbecue. The yard extends along the southern and northern parts, which also include a garage. Considering the size of the yard, the construction of a swimming pool is possible. The house is equipped with 4 air conditioning units, while on the ground floor there is a cast-iron stove and on the first floor a wood stove. The house insulation is done with stone wool. As an investment, the house offers excellent potential due to the fact that there are two apartments on the ground floor already rented out for tourism, while the first floor provides a comfortable living space for future owners due to its size. The location is extremely quiet, and there is a sea view from the first floor of the house. For more information and viewing: Phone: +385 99 701 6618 Email: marin.roncevic@c21.hr
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Peć na kruta goriva
adresa_agencije: Adresa:Josipa Bana Jelačića 1d, 23000 Zadar, Zadarska, Hrvatska
